label: CuePilot
description: Schema for controlling an instance of CuePilot through OSC commands.

commands.label: Skip
commands.description: Execution of the next shot is skipped while active, automatically toggles off after a shot has passed

commands.label: Take
commands.description: Take next shot, timeline doesn't skip, just execution of the next camera switch on the main track

commands.label: Hold
commands.description: Toggle Hold (while Hold is engaged, execution of vision track cues is paused)

commands.label: Hold On
commands.description: Turn on Hold (while Hold is engaged, execution of vision track cues is paused)

commands.label: Hold Off
commands.description: Turn off Hold (while Hold is engaged, execution of vision track cues is paused)

commands.label: Home
commands.description: Go to the Start of the timeline

commands.label: Sync Off
commands.description: Set Sync to incoming timecode Off /cuepilot/sync/off

commands.label: Sync Step
commands.description: Set Sync to Step Mode (step allows manually skipping through the timeline from shot to shot and its execution

commands.label: Load Prev Act
commands.description: Load previous item (act) in rundown - (item is a section of a rundown, like a song in a show)

commands.label: Load Next Act
commands.description: Load previous item (act) in rundown - (item is a section of a rundown, like a song in a show)
